main event: A possible meteor or unidentified object was sighted over Hereford, Texas on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as moving at a terrific rate of speed from south to north.
The object then appeared to be brighter than usual and traveled in a straight course.
Several people reported similar sightings in the area of Levelland, Texas on the same night.
The Air Technical Intelligence Center received a letter from an attorney in Hereford inquiring about the sightings.

The Air Technical Intelligence Center stated that the investigation of the reported sightings in the Levelland area had produced a considerable amount of complex and varied data with a considerable amount of doubt remaining until a more comprehensive evaluation could be made.
